definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
lit. like a little bird relying on people (idiom)/fig. cute and helpless-looking

sentences.english: A small bird will drop frozen dead from a bough without ever having felt sorry for itself.
sentences.chinese: 一隻小鳥將自枝頭凍斃跌下來他未曾爲自己感到可憐。

sentences.english: A little chook was flying south for the Winter.
sentences.chinese: 一隻小鳥飛到南邊去過冬。

sentences.english: The bird pecked at the bread crumbs.
The bird in the clock gaily hops out and says cuckoo.
sentences.chinese: 鍾裏的小鳥愉快地跳出來，“布穀布穀”地叫着。

sentences.english: Bees are busy working and birds are singing in the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂忙着工作，小鳥在藍天中歌唱。

sentences.english: Snakes are said to fascinate small animals and birds.
sentences.chinese: 據說蛇能蠱惑小動物和小鳥。

sentences.english: The arrow went straight and hit the eye of the bird.
sentences.chinese: 箭筆直的飛出去，正中小鳥的那隻眼睛。

sentences.english: Handmade Christmas ornaments made for the fans of Angry Birds.
sentences.chinese: 手工製成的聖誕樹小掛件，小鳥迷們有福啦。

sentences.english: Why can't I fly like a bird in the blue sky?
sentences.chinese: 我爲什麼不能像小鳥一樣在藍天上自由自在地翱翔呢？

sentences.english: You are unable to lock-on to smaller helicopters, such as Little Birds.
sentences.chinese: 你不能鎖定小型直升機，比如小鳥。

sentences.english: Hang a couple of bird feeders in a tree and set up a bird bath.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在樹上懸掛幾個餵食器或放置一個小鳥浴盆。

sentences.english: The fledglings were amazing to watch as they tried to fly for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 那些剛長羽毛的小鳥初次飛行的樣子令人歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: The bird enjoyed a dinner of flatfish…
sentences.chinese: 小鳥先津津有味地吞進一條比目魚。

sentences.english: The bird began to put twigs and grass in the hat.
sentences.chinese: 小鳥開始往帽子裏放小樹枝和草。

sentences.english: Alittle bird told me it's your birthday on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 有隻小鳥告訴我，週六是你的生日。

sentences.english: "Oh, well! They're nothing but birds," said Mr. Hardin.
sentences.chinese: “哦，好了，它們只不過是些小鳥，”哈丁先生說。

definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
yelling (sound made by person)/barking/braying/roaring (sound made by animals)
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
Tashu township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
to circle in the air/to soar
pigeon/dove/various birds of the family Columbidae
